QuestData.Title: Rescue Mission
QuestData.Description: The demon has told us how to open a portal to the world where he says Alleria is being held. You and I can go through and see if there is any truth to his claims.$b$bIn case it's a trap, Magus Solgaze has given me a portal stone to get us back to Dalaran.$b$bThis demonic magic is anathema to the mage, so we must move quickly. I'm ready when you are, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel through the portal and rescue Alleria Windrunner.

Objectives.Objective: Travel through the portal to Niskara
Talk to Vereesa and leave Niskara
Speak to Vereesa and begin the mission
